targets.expr: sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name="xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe",cf_errorCode=~"0|-1000|-1|83886096|83886580|2130706845|16"}[5m]))*60

(sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m]))/sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_sum{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m])))

(sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe", net_sock_host_port!~"9443|9444|9445|9446|9448|9452", http_status_code="4.*|5.*|"}[$__rate_interval])) or sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe", net_sock_host_port!~"9443|9444|9445|9446|9448|9452"}[$__rate_interval])) *0)/sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe", net_sock_host_port!~"9443|9444|9445|9446|9448|9452"}[$__rate_interval]))

(sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", span_name=~"/TouchPoint/action/.*", http_method="POST", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", net_host_name="xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m]))/sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_sum{app_group="XESS", span_name=~"/TouchPoint/action/.*", http_method="POST", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", net_host_name="xessch.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m])))

(sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR", host_name=~"pxesswasp(02|03|04|05)"}[5m])*60) or sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", host_name=~"pxesswasp(02|03|04|05)" }[5m])*60) *0)
sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name="xes.lima.bcp.com.pe",cf_errorCode=~"0|-1000|-1|83886096|83886580|2130706845|16"}[5m]))*60

(sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xes.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m]))/sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_sum{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xes.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m])))

(sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xes.lima.bcp.com.pe", net_sock_host_port!~"9443|9444|9445|9446|9448|9452", http_status_code="4.*|5.*|"}[$__rate_interval])) or sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xes.lima.bcp.com.pe", net_sock_host_port!~"9443|9444|9445|9446|9448|9452"}[$__rate_interval])) *0)/sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", net_host_name=~"xes.lima.bcp.com.pe", net_sock_host_port!~"9443|9444|9445|9446|9448|9452"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", span_name=~"/TouchPoint/action/.*", http_method="POST", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", net_host_name="xes.lima.bcp.com.pe",cf_errorCode=~"0|-1000|-1|83886096|83886580|2130706845|16"}[5m]))*60

(sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", span_name=~"/TouchPoint/action/.*", http_method="POST", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", net_host_name="xes.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m]))/sum (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_sum{app_group="XESS", span_name=~"/TouchPoint/action/.*", http_method="POST", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", net_host_name="xes.lima.bcp.com.pe"}[4m])))

(sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR", host_name=~"pxesswasp(07|08|09|10)"}[4m])*60) or sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{app_group="XESS", host_name=~"pxesswasp(07|08|09|10)" }[4m])*60) *0)
